com.google.android.exoplayer

Class DecoderInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.DecoderInfo

  • public final class DecoderInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information about a media decoder.

    • Field Summary

      boolean adaptive
      Whether the decoder supports seamless resolution switches.

      MediaCodecInfo.CodecCapabilities for this decoder.

      The name of the decoder.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        public final java.lang.String name
        The name of the decoder.

        May be passed to MediaCodec.createByCodecName(String) to create an instance of the decoder.

        public final android.media.MediaCodecInfo.CodecCapabilities capabilities
        MediaCodecInfo.CodecCapabilities for this decoder.

      • adaptive

        public final boolean adaptive
        Whether the decoder supports seamless resolution switches.
        See Also:
        MediaCodecInfo.CodecCapabilities.isFeatureSupported(String), MediaCodecInfo.CodecCapabilities.FEATURE_AdaptivePlayback
